text: Hallehurst is a historic mansion in Pulaski, Tennessee, U.S.. It was built in 1878 for Newton Harris White, a politician. It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since September 6, 2006. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Tennessee Category:Colonial Revival architecture in Tennessee Category:Houses completed in 1920 Category:Houses in Giles County, Tennessee Category:Historic districts on the National Register of Historic Places in Tennessee
title: Hallehurst
